channel.title: CVE Feed for bandisoft -- ARK
channel.description: The latest CVEs for bandisoft -- ARK

item.title: CVE-2021-26603|2024-08-03T20:26:25.472Z -- bandisoft -- ark
item.description: A heap overflow issue was found in ARK library of bandisoft Co., Ltd when the Ark_DigPathA function parsed a file path. This vulnerability is due to missing support for string length check.

item.title: CVE-2021-26615|2024-08-03T20:26:25.531Z -- bandisoft -- ark
item.description: ARK library allows attackers to execute remote code via the parameter(path value) of Ark_NormalizeAndDupPAthNameW function because of an integer overflow.
